instructions: 直走經過右手邊的Abstract Group。
目的地就在前方的 EIZO Inc.。

companies.name: EIZO Inc.
companies.description: EIZO is a visual technology company dedicating the last 50 years to developing high-end, specific use monitors. This year EIZO has been awarded a Scientific and Technical Award from the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences for its ColorEdge CG Series monitors with integrated self-calibration sensors. For Post-Production and VFX, the ColorEdge line of Self-Calibrating Wide Gamut monitors features built-in calibration sensors, uniformity correction, and 3D Programmable LUTs to ensure any professional's most accurate image reproduction monitor.
companies.categories: 3D Graphics, Animation/Film, Digital Imaging, High Resolution Technologies, Imaging, Interactive Display Technologies, Monitors/Displays/Terminals, Video Effects Equipment, Visual Effects Software
